name: Quick Fix (Redoak Studios, ruimartins, Diotins, NCHammer)
name_original: Quick Fix (Redoak Studios, ruimartins, Diotins, NCHammer)
description: With limited resources, you'll have to fix parts of your vehicle in real time in order to make it to the finish line. Choose wisely which parts to fix at which times as they influence how the vehicle runs.
